data.name: Faylinn's Quest: NSFW Patch
data.detailed_description:
!Warning!
Download only if you are of adult legal age and consent to adding 18+ explicit scenes to the game Faylinn's Quest
!Warning!

This DLC will add a "NSFW" option to the main menu that you can use to toggle adult scenes ON/OFF.
This won't affect the game in terms of gameplay or story. It will add pictures and dialogue during love scenes.

By downloading this you confirm that you are of adult legal age and consent to adding explicit content to your game.
Thank you

data.short_description: Adds NSFW content to Faylinn's Quest. Download this only if you are an adult.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Explicit sex scenes and dialogue.
All sex is consensual and all characters depicted are above legal age.
